elements.text:
You've been texting with someone you really like and they're usually quick to respond. You notice that they saw your message a couple of hours ago and did not respond. 

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

text: I want to remove them from my phone, but decide to give the situation some time and cool off.
I reach out to a friend.
I start working on other important things I want to do today.
I want to send a bunch of messages to this person, but instead call a friend.
I cancel my plans for the day.
